do not succumb to the masses ideas over ridicule and judgement for those who follow the ideas of the weak will perish in a dim fog of enlightenment become the vision of the minds eye and carry your flame to the fire do not wait for the fire to carry the flame to you build work build work build work fall down fail learn learn earn earn and conquer money is a tool for the creation of a creative space do not squander the value of a gift from a friend family strangers enemies atheists partisans pedlers people people in this ocean of hungry minds feed do not starve start now wake up a trillion more lives will live happy before one of those trillion care or not about your happiness love yourself and hate only you if you dont...
